summary: BuildRequest contained no explicit requirements or acceptance criteria, so no missing requirements can be identified. The diff introduces multiple new behaviors/features across backend and frontend (authorization, user profiles, field/task enhancements, UI styling changes), which are not traceable to any stated request.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded backend authorization and role/permission gating for user access.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so implementing authorization logic is not requested by the spec.

hallucinated_features.description: Added user profile functionality (get/save caller profile, get other user profile with admin/self restriction).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so adding user profile APIs/UI is not requested by the spec.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented/expanded field creation/update to include icon, color, and backgroundColor plus additional field statistics (avg* and duration totals).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so adding these field properties/statistics is not requested by the spec.

hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so the theme/styling changes are not requested by the spec.

hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so these page-level features are not requested by the spec.
